description.tr: Marks & Spencer, 1884 yılında Michael Marks ve Thomas Spencer tarafından kurulan Marks & Spencer Group plc bünyesindeki perakende markasıdır.Hindistan, Türkiye, Rusya, Yunanistan, İrlanda, Fransa, Polonya, Macaristan, Finlandiya ve İspanya’da mağazaları bulunmaktadır.Hissedarları:Threadneedle Asset Management Ltd. description.en:
Marks & Spencer is a retail brand under Marks & Spencer Group plc, founded in 1884 by Michael Marks and Thomas Spencer. It has stores in India, Turkey, Russia, Greece, Ireland, France, Poland, Hungary, Finland, and Spain.

Shareholders:
Threadneedle Asset Management Ltd. (4.9 percent)
RWC Asset Management LLP (4.7 percent)
Schroder Investment Management Ltd. (4.5 percent)
The Vanguard Group, Inc. (3.5 percent)
Norges Bank Investment Management (2.8 percent)
1832 Asset Management LP (2.5 percent)
Société Générale Gestion SA (2.2 percent)
Capital Research & Management Co. (2.1 percent)
Baillie Gifford & Co. (2.1 percent)
Dimensional Fund Advisors LP (2 percent)

Brands within the group:
Per Una
Autograph
Limited
Rosie
Blue Harbour
M&S Collection
M&S Energy
description.de:
Marks & Spencer ist eine Einzelhandelsmarke der Marks & Spencer Group plc, die 1884 von Michael Marks und Thomas Spencer gegründet wurde. Das Unternehmen hat Filialen in Indien, der Türkei, Russland, Griechenland, Irland, Frankreich, Polen, Ungarn, Finnland und Spanien.

Aktionäre:

description.tr: Motorsport.tv Hangi Ülkenin KanalıMotorsport.tv, motor yarışı ve otomobil içeriğinde uzmanlaşmış küresel bir çevrimiçi akış platformudur.2016 yılında Amerikan medya ve teknoloji şirketi Motorsport Network tarafından satın alınmıştır.
description.en:
Motorsport.tv Which Country's Channel?

Motorsport.tv is a global online streaming platform specializing in motor racing and automotive content. It was acquired in 2016 by the American media and technology company Motorsport Network.
description.de: Motorsport.tv ist eine globale Online-Streaming-Plattform, die sich auf Motorsport- und Automobilinhalte spezialisiert hat. Sie wurde 2016 von dem amerikanischen Medien- und Technologieunternehmen Motorsport Network übernommen. Motorsport Network hat seinen Hauptsitz in Miami, Florida, USA, und London, Großbritannien.

description.en:
Procter & Gamble, abbreviated as P&G, is a consumer goods brand under Procter & Gamble Co., which was founded in 1837. Procter & Gamble Co. is headquartered in America and operates in 70 countries. In Turkey, it has been operating as Procter Gamble Tüketim Malları San. A.Ş. since 1987.

description.tr: BİM, 1995 yılında kurulan BİM Birleşik Mağazalar A.Ş. bünyesindeki indirim marketi zinciridir.Geniş bir ürün yelpazesine sahiptir ayrıca özel markalı ürünler sunmaktadır.İstanbul merkezlidir. Türkiye, Mısır ve Fas’ta toplam yaklaşık 10 bin mağazaya sahiptir.Ortaklık yapısı:Merkez Bereket Gıda San. ve Tic. A.Ş. (yüzde 15,15)Naspak Gıda San. ve Tic. A.Ş. (yüzde 11,53)Diğer (Halka Açık) (yüzde 71,64)
description.en:
BİM is a discount supermarket chain operating under BİM Birleşik Mağazalar A.Ş., which was founded in 1995. It offers a wide range of products, including private label brands. The company is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. As of late 2024, BİM has approximately 13,583 stores in total across Turkey, Egypt, and Morocco. More specifically, as of 2024, BİM operates over 12,482 stores in Turkey, 687 in Morocco, and 356 in Egypt.

The ownership structure is as follows:
*   Merkez Bereket Gıda San. ve Tic. A.Ş. (15.15%)
*   Naspak Gıda San. ve Tic. A.Ş. (11.53%)
*   Other (Publicly Traded) (71.64%)
description.de:
BİM ist eine Discounter-Supermarktkette der 1995 gegründeten BİM Birleşik Mağazalar A.Ş. Sie verfügt über eine breite Produktpalette und bietet auch Eigenmarkenprodukte an. Das Unternehmen hat seinen Hauptsitz in Istanbul und betreibt insgesamt rund 10.000 Filialen in der Türkei, Ägypten und Marokko.

Die Eigentümerstruktur ist wie folgt:
Merkez Bereket Gıda San. ve Tic. A.Ş. (15,15 Prozent)
Naspak Gıda San. ve Tic. A.Ş. (11,53 Prozent)
Sonstige (Börsennotiert) (71,64 Prozent)

company: Maşa ve Koca Ayı Çizgi Filmi

description.tr: Maşa ve Ayı, 2008 yılında kurulmuş olan Animaccord Ltd. bünyesinde üretilen animasyon markasıdır.25 dile çevrilen çizgi film 150’den fazla ülkede yayınlandı.Animaccord Ltd. Güney Kıbrıs Rum kesimi merkezlidir.
description.en: "Masha and the Bear" is an animated brand produced by Animaccord Ltd., which was founded in 2008. The cartoon has been translated into 25 languages and broadcast in over 150 countries. Animaccord Ltd. was originally headquartered in Moscow, Russia, but later relocated its primary operations to Limassol, Cyprus, to expand its international footprint. The company was registered in Cyprus on December 31, 2008.
description.de: "Masha und der Bär" ist eine Animationsmarke, die von Animaccord Ltd. produziert wird, einem Unternehmen, das 2008 gegründet wurde. Die Zeichentrickserie wurde in über 42 Sprachen übersetzt und in mehr als 150 Ländern ausgestrahlt. Animaccord Ltd. hat seinen Hauptsitz in Zypern.
